Cong bang ma noi Buffet Ong binh Dan thi dung la co chut chen lan, dong nguoi, binh dan ve moi mat. Nhung cung khong co gi la qua*** Toi la nguoi co thu nhap cao. An buffet o rat nhieu noi voi nhieu loai gia tu re 100k+ den cao cap 1000k+. Toi se cham Ong binh Dan 8/10. 
Nhung ban comment nguoi ta***gi do, thi nen cong tam mot chut. Con nguoi Bay gio thich thi khong noi gi nhieu. Nhung he khong vua y cai gi mot chut la lap tuc nem gach nem da nguoi ta tham te, ma khong can suy nghi. 
Nguoi***minh thu nhap cung dau co cao gi. Nha hang o***thi gia***luc nao cung dat do. Co Nhung noi nhu Ong Binh Dan la rat tot, gia hop ly. Rat***dong tien bat gao.

 When I was bringing my daughter to school I caught a sight of this new Beef soup restaurant. I went inside and get one bowl. Let's avoid talking about how it taste. After a few spoons, I feel dizzy. My back was cold as ice and my neck was killing me like it grew spikes in there. I was very disappointed. How old is the Earth now that makes people putting toxics into the soup! Outy of that, the "so-called Beef soup" is actually a Porkchop soup, the steamed minced meat it made of flour. The price is also acceptable, but when you finish your meal you have to pay a five thousand VND price for keeping your vehicle. So I give it a sweet bye bye. I am writting this article in English so people who travels to this country get an advice, because there are many foreigners in such a location wanting to try a Beef soup.

content:
Came here because of a recommendation from a local. The location was pretty good, when you arrive you walk up the stairs onto their patio that has covers for when it gets too hot. 

We ordered banh beo and was different from what we re used to...there were croutons for the toppings. I didnt mind it for the cheap price we were paying. The fish sauce was also good. Didnt get to try the bun bo since it was way too hot out to eat a hot soup but it looked really good.

The location is very convenient, easy to find. The space/atmosphere here is very quiet. You have a variety of seating options (outdoor or indoor).

Food and drink were very good and lots of options, average price.

Very fast, polite and professional service. The owner is very kind and friendly, he always remembers the tastes and preferences of the customers (a plus point that makes the customers feel welcomed). Overall everything is very perfect and I highly recommend this restaurant.
shop_name: 365 Degrees Pizzeria & Bar

content:
I had a Napoli Pepperoni pizza with homemade Mozzarella cheese. The cheese was so creamy and went with pepperoni above. Just a bit of tabasco would be a great combination. The ambience was so refreshing too with palm trees next door. The price was reasonable given its quality. I will come back for their tasty pizzas.
(They have Kashew cheese pizzas as vegan options too apparently, so you would definitely find something special for you here)
shop_name: 365 Degrees Pizzeria & Bar

content:
I havent been to this place for over a year. It had used to be my regular haunt for lunch or even after hour drinks. Coming back here today was definitely a good choice.

Decided on the classic Boomerang Burger as I needed to have some meat, and neither steak nor ribs were a choice for me today. The juicy patty in the burger is amazing and goes well with the 2 types of sauces - mayonnaise and bbq. The burger bun is fresh and holds down the burger well. The sides of chips were good; but i wished they were soggy chips in vinegar rather than deep fried and tossed in salt. 

If you are a fan of beet roots, go for the Australian Burger instead.

I'd highly recommend a visit or even a repeat visit!
shop_name: Boomerang Bistro Saigon

content: Great food, normal service, normal decoration. Will be back couse of food there!

Would never recommend this place.
